title: Can't buy Bard?
body:
I go to the shop, try to buy Bard with IP, and instead of unlocking him I get this message:

"Woops! We just changed the price of this item.  Please review the updated price below before continuing."

But there is nothing below and nothing happens.  Riot, y u do this?

Edit:  All is well.  I now own every champ again :)

replies.body:
Sorry about that! 

Sometimes, price changes take a small amount of time to swap over. In the meantime, you'll receive that error.
yeah, does it just work out itself or did you do something?
I tried buying him after 15 minutes again and it worked just fine now. Seems to have worked itself out without doing anything.
Got the same problem. How did you solve it?
